header.title: Meet Me On Nostr
header.tagline: an app for sharing Nostr with friends.

InviteCard.default_advocate: Because your invite code was not recognized, and Nostr is better with frineds, im gonna go ahead and be your first friend on nostr. Feel free to contact me with any questions as you set up your account and find new frineds on Nostr.
InviteCard.help_msg: Create an account to follow me to discover my favorite apps and trusted friends on Nostr.
InviteCard.aboutnostr: Nostr is the privacy respecting decentralized social network that everybody owns. Your account profile(s), your follows & followers, and the content you create on Nostr are yours forever. Use any app and post to any server that uses the Nostr protocol.

LoginCard.message_pubuser: Generate QR codes to invite your friends.
LoginCard.message_secuser: Login with browser extenstion to customize invites and track progress.

AwardsPromoCard.details: COMMING SOON!! Every month top Nostr advcates will win!
